Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLIView

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLIView.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface, PropertyChangeListener, Runnable, EventListener
public class CLI extends Object implements Runnable, UserInterface
Class CLI represents the terminal UI
